query.sql: SELECT a.archive_id, a.channel_pf, a.channel_zs, a.channel_jt, a.channel_yc, a.channel_jj, ifnull(a.channel_pf,0) +ifnull(a.channel_zs,0) +ifnull(a.channel_jt,0) +ifnull(a.channel_yc,0) + ifnull(a.channel_jj,0) channel_total, DATE_FORMAT(a.cost_date,'%Y-%m-%d') cost_date FROM pf_profit_archive a where a.book_id = ${@book_id} #AND_CLAUSE# order by a.cost_date desc

query.name: archiveSummary
query.sql: SELECT SUM(ifnull(a.channel_pf, 0)) as total_channel_pf, SUM(ifnull(a.channel_zs, 0)) as total_channel_zs, SUM(ifnull(a.channel_jt, 0)) as total_channel_jt, SUM(ifnull(a.channel_yc, 0)) as total_channel_yc, SUM(ifnull(a.channel_jj, 0)) as total_channel_jj, SUM(ifnull(a.channel_pf, 0) + ifnull(a.channel_zs, 0) + ifnull(a.channel_jt, 0) + ifnull(a.channel_yc, 0) + ifnull(a.channel_jj, 0)) as total_channel_total FROM pf_profit_archive a WHERE a.book_id = ${@book_id} #AND_CLAUSE#

collisionSql.where: exists (select 1 from pf_profit_archive where cost_date = ${@cost_date} and book_id = ${@book_id})
